paper_abstract: In the symplectic polar space W-5(q) every 1-system which satisfies the BLT-property ( and then q is odd) defines a generalized quadrangle (GQ) of order (q(2), q(3)). In this paper, we show that this 1-system is unique, so that the onlyGQarising in this way is isomorphic to the classical GQ H( 4, q(2)), q odd.
paper_title: The uniqueness of 1-systems of W-5(q) satisfying the BLT-property, with q odd
